about_the_game:
If you’re ready to get out there and defend the Earth from extradimensional monsters, the Closers Operator Pack is just the ticket!

The Operator Pack contains:

  • Operator Costume Set (Full Body + Hair)
  • 30-Day Elite Status Voucher—Get the most out of Closers with a full month of elite status!
  • 30-Day Maid Service Voucher—Improve your explorations for 30 days.
  • 30-Day Gardening Voucher—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day.
  • +12 Gear Booster / +13 Random Box

*Please note that the Operator Costume Set will work for all characters except Bai*
detailed_description:
If you’re ready to get out there and defend the Earth from extradimensional monsters, the Closers Operator Pack is just the ticket!

The Operator Pack contains:

  • 30-Day Maid Service Voucher—Improve your explorations for 30 days.
  • 30-Day Gardening Voucher—Increase the number of times you can plant seeds…and get a free Rainbow Seed each day.
  • +12 Gear Booster / +13 Random Box

*Please note that the Operator Costume Set will work for all characters except Bai*

name: Closers: Operator Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
